content: knitted hooded scarf in drops daisy and drops kid-silk the piece is worked with pearl rib and i-cord sizes s - xl pattern da-041 yarn group b + a **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm length from hood-opening approx 41-43 cm width approx 192-194 cm **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200 g colour 09 ice blue **and** use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 75-75 g colour 59 ice crystal **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with pearl rib and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm
